meanings.sent1: I tried a delicious jagdwurst sandwich for lunch.
meanings.sent2: The butcher recommended the jagdwurst for the barbecue.
meanings.sent3: The jagdwurst rolled off the plate and onto the floor!
meanings.sent4: The aroma of sizzling jagdwurst filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The jagdwurst was so juicy and flavorful, it became my favorite sausage.

meanings.definition: A type of cold cut meat.
meanings.sent1: The party platter included slices of jagdwurst.
meanings.sent2: My sandwich was packed with tasty jagdwurst slices.
meanings.sent3: The jagdwurst slices danced on the plate as I carried it.
meanings.sent4: The jagdwurst slices were as thin as paper but full of flavor.
meanings.sent5: The jagdwurst slices melted in my mouth, leaving a savory taste.

meanings.sent1: I asked for extra jagdwurst in my sandwich.
meanings.sent2: The deli counter had a special on jagdwurst today.
meanings.sent3: The jagdwurst in the sandwich winked at me - how funny!
meanings.sent4: The jagdwurst in the salad added a burst of flavor.
meanings.sent5: The deli's jagdwurst was so fresh, it made my sandwich perfect.
